traffic_visible_response: 正在搜索找到 12 篇资料参考The reasons for Qin Gang's dismissal have not been officially disclosed in detail. But personnel adjustments in government positions usually result from a combination of various factors, such as **organizational arrangements** and **the need for work**.According to public information, on July 25, 2023, the Fourth Session of the 14th National People's Congress Standing Committee decided to remove Qin Gang from his position as Minister of Foreign Affairs. On October 24, 2023, the Sixth Session of the 14th National People's Congress Standing Committee decided to remove Qin Gang from his position as State Councilor. On February 27, 2024, the Tianjin Municipal People's Congress Standing Committee decided to accept Qin Gang's resignation from his position as a deputy to the 14th National People's Congress. On July 18, 2024, the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided to accept Qin Gang's resignation and remove him from his position as a member of the Central Committee.
